website_summaries.verdict: Low-cost paternity test with a huge hidden fee – buyer beware.
pros: Economical test to buy if you can wait to process the full test later
cons: You have to pay more than $100 in lab fees in addition to the cost of the test

customer_reviews.title: ILLEGAL IN NY!
customer_reviews.text: ILLEGAL IN NYS! We did this, spent the money and then found out they have the results, but can't release them because we are in NY!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Brundige

customer_reviews.title: Identagene is such an affordable option!
customer_reviews.text: Test is very reliable. I bought this back in 2016 for at home use. Now we have set up an appointment with the lab for a chain of custody test that can be used in ckurt for ligitimization.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, I got accurate results and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Not mashing picyqnd missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts from the package and not the same of picture
customer_reviews.author: rosaura castro

customer_reviews.title: wow so crazy
customer_reviews.text: i could not even use this iten it was to old
customer_reviews.author: kenneth matthews

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Crazy 2 get u 2 buy something that's cheaper than what the test gonna be n I mean the lab treating is over a $120
customer_reviews.author: Christy L.

customer_reviews.title: You have to pay the lab fees too.
customer_reviews.text: The lab part is expensive, but it was easy and it worked
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Buchannon

customer_reviews.title: No more $600 tests
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to test. Instructions very clear. Procedures very likely to those of FCI. Comes with everything you need, including stamps.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: Just as it was described
customer_reviews.text: it done the same as the one I had brought before in the store just at a much cheaper price that was great.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.W

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, painless!
customer_reviews.text: this product is great. it was cheap, quick to get here, easy to do and the results came back fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: fast and accurate as well as easy to read results
customer_reviews.text: Results came in two days! fast and accurate as well as easy to read results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick results.
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to do and the results were back before I expected. I recommend this product to anyone that needs to find out one way or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: easy!
customer_reviews.text: This test was very easy to use. Detailed instuctions walk you thru the whole process! Results were available in a reasonable amount of time and easy to read and understand.
customer_reviews.author: yes you do need to get  specific one under new york!

customer_reviews.title: works great but there are hidden costs
customer_reviews.text: this product worked out great for my brother in law i ordered it for him to prove that a child was not his in his divorce
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: 250$ dollar lab charge. It's cheaper to have insurance do it. I didn't even use it bc of the time to send in and get back and the lab fees.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Item exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: No hidden fees, great customer service over the phone . I accidentally got a NY kit and reside in PA and it still was so easy absolutely no hassles or hidden fees . Just the $129 as labeled on box . I highly recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money. This is a sham
customer_reviews.text: Never gave me my results and you will spend literally hours on hold waiting for a person to answer that will never come on the line. This is a complete waste of money.. do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Daily

customer_reviews.title: Love this prodcut
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy this existed helped me find out I wasn't the father.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tried it but my friend told me it works ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it but my friend told me it works 100% when u call them & send them the test/ samples.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy Dave

customer_reviews.title: Hated to have to get this
customer_reviews.text: Hated to have to get this, but it was fast and easy. Made finding out who my biological father was fast and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Life!!!
customer_reviews.text: Identigene is a women's lie detector, and other cases magic 8 ball of answers. This helped me clear my name of being a bad father, and it will keep you in control of your life. If you see 1 star reviews they are from women who tried to trap innocent men.
customer_reviews.author: amani

customer_reviews.title: Confusing test results.
customer_reviews.text: Confusing test results,. Customer service awful. No help and definatly not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate

customer_reviews.title: A bittersweet buy.
customer_reviews.text: So I did a test, but they were unable to generate any real results, which sucks. HOWEVER, they do offer additional free kits for recollection or a refund on lab testing fees if you choose not retest.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Name not Included
customer_reviews.text: so you buy this product for its nature DNA the charge is $139.99 this test will not include NAMES how will you know who this belongs to, makes no sense. Then the rep will adv we can give you a discount if you go to the lad ok but the lab is charging $485.00 with a discount of only $29.99 all this info should be on the box so customers dont waste there time with this at home DNA crap. Get it together people. when a customer buys a product they want to k now all the info prior to buying a product that will not work DNA without name who does that.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Funny how that works since they were able to charge ...
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! They double charged my card the $89. Upon calling them they will refund back to Credit Card within 2-3 weeks???? Funny how that works since they were able to charge my card the same day...
customer_reviews.author: Betty S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: took way too long
customer_reviews.text: We bought it not realizing you spend about $300 including lawyer fees. Its been 2 weeks and we still haven't gotten results
customer_reviews.author: too long

customer_reviews.title: crooks
customer_reviews.text: I bought the test, gave a sample and sent the other sample off with the childs grandmother. No pin was presented to me on my sample packet. I called the company 2 weeks later asking about the results. The company emailed me a form saying I had to send a picture of my i.d.and $25. My privacy has been throughly invaded I wouldnt recommend this test for anyone. They nickel and dime every oportunity.
customer_reviews.author: honestgurl

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: SCAM. I was given one case number. When results came online, I logged in and downloaded the test. It had a completely different case number. I wrote to them, no answer. Wrote again, no answer. Wrote a third time, still dead silent. If this is how they treat their customers, beware and stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Motti Morell

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This is a worst, terrible all the bad things out there you can name with this company. Stay away from it to save you time and money. I don't think it deserve 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Viet Vu

product_meta.title: Identigene Dna Paternity Test Collection Kit
product_meta.description: For alleged father, mother and child. Additional 129.00 US Dollar laboratory fee required. DNA test results reported to you in 3-5 days. The most trusted name in DNA testing. For questions only DNA can answer. Since 1993, Identigene has made DNA testing simple and affordable. Why is knowing paternity important? Paternity can affect a child's financial welfare and parental custody. Many important life decisions are impacted by paternity. For many parents, children, and families, paternity knowledge provides peace of mind. Can I use the results in a court of law? Yes, however paternity testing for legal purposes requires special collection procedures. The cost is 200.00 US Dollars in addition to the regular 129.00 US Dollar laboratory fee. Technical Excellence - Identigene, a leader in DNA testing, is accredited both nationally and internationally. Our laboratory follows rigid scientific protocol and routinely provides results with probabilities greater than 99.99%. Strict Confidentiality - Identigene is committed to your privacy. All information is kept between Identigene and you.
feature_bullets: For alleged father, mother and child, DNA test results reported to you in 3-5 days
Additional 129.00 US Dollar laboratory fee required, The most trusted name in DNA testing
Since 1993, Identigene has made DNA testing simple and affordable,
Strict Confidentiality - Identigene is committed to your privacy. All information is kept between Identigene and you
